attributes.additional_details: I believe we should leave the E.U completely & be a independant country,importing less & freezing borders til the immigration problem is sorted.The amount of money that could be saved with stopping M.P's expenses & having a monthly wage,one house,need to stay in london..rent a B+B room.We should build more industry,why do we deal with countries that import illegally drugs & counterfeit goods,but still deal with them.There is no trust & the gov has not done anything the public wanted,or asked.The interests of the public has not been looked after,nor money spent wisely,pay rises & expenses,growing bank accounts while people are without jobs,ripped off by cowboy builders,the public is drained & too is its patience.
